summary.span: 控制 .NET 远程处理生存期服务。

span.span: Controls the.NET remoting lifetime services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 分布式的垃圾回收是负责控制服务器应用程序的生存期，并在它们的生存期结束时删除它们。Distributed garbage collection is responsible for controlling the lifetimes of server applications, and for deleting them when their lifetimes have expired. 传统上，分布式的垃圾回收使用引用计数和 ping 进行控制。Traditionally, distributed garbage collection uses reference counts and pinging for control. 这适用于有几个客户端每个对象，但也有数千个每个每个对象的客户端时无法正常工作。This works well when there are a few clients per object, but does not work well when there are thousands of clients per each object. 当客户端的数量增加时，生存期服务可以假定传统的分布式垃圾回收器中和规模的函数。The lifetime service can assume the function of a traditional distributed garbage collector, and scales well when the number of clients increases. 生存期服务将与每个远程激活对象关联的租约。The lifetime service associates a lease with each remotely activated object. 当租约已过期时，将删除该对象。When the lease expires, the object is removed. > [!NOTE] > 此类，使链接要求。This class makes a link demand. 如果直接调用方没有基础结构的权限，将引发安全异常。A SecurityException is thrown if the immediate caller does not have infrastructure permission. 请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)有关详细信息。See [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) for more information. ## Examples [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/CS/server.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Lifetime/VB/server.vb#2)]
